markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Jellyfish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=707)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Unlike its smaller cousins, the giant jellyfish is an active predator that chases down its prey through reefs or open water. It can even squeeze its enormous bell-shaped body into the tight confines of shipwrecks to drape its mane of tentacles across the exposed flesh of its prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Jellyfish_GiantJellyfish.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Giant Jellyfish](/Monsters.aspx?ID=707)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 152 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +6

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +1 

</row>

**HP** 165

**Immunities**
[mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), precision

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 10, poison 10

**Weaknesses**
piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tentacle +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+8 bludgeoning plus jellyfish venom

**Jellyfish Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 25 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 2d8 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round); **Stage 2** 3d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d10 poison damage and [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) (1 round)

**Squeeze**   A giant jellyfish can fit into tight spaces as if it were a Medium creature. It can move at its full Speed while  [Squeezing](/Actions.aspx?ID=31).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-140" />
name: Giant Jellyfish
